channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
No, I do not want to be reading news about one of the Jewish communities @jewishstandard covers in my tech/science feed, thank you very much.

https://t.co/p3QSohP3T9
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @jothar @mikefox26 A shame. It seems like the the Moetzes certainly could use a doctor on board. He would have set a useful precedent. https://t.co/p3QSohP3T9
item.source:markdown: @jothar @mikefox26 A shame. It seems like the the Moetzes certainly could use a doctor on board. He would have set a useful precedent. https://t.co/p3QSohP3T9

item.description: @MotownRabbi @DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus He was frum. He had just suffered through too many years of yeshiva students who could handle lomdus but not history.
item.source:markdown: @MotownRabbi @DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus He was frum. He had just suffered through too many years of yeshiva students who could handle lomdus but not history.

item.description: As we approach Tisha b'Av, might be worth reflecting on the fact that the Arizona man quoted as opposing an exceedingly modest corporate tax increase has an Israeli flag and a picture of the Temple Mount on his Twitter profile. #WhatWouldIsaiahDo https://t.co/31nBZadksl
item.source:markdown: As we approach Tisha b'Av, might be worth reflecting on the fact that the Arizona man quoted as opposing an exceedingly modest corporate tax increase has an Israeli flag and a picture of the Temple Mount on his Twitter profile. #WhatWouldIsaiahDo https://t.co/31nBZadksl

item.description: @brumyehuda Daas Torah is a cruel but fair judge.
item.source:markdown: @brumyehuda Daas Torah is a cruel but fair judge.

item.description: @joshtpm Seiden seems like a nice enough guy for a veteran Republican operative. Though it would be irresponsible not to speculate why he didn't last more than a year as Intel's lobbyist.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Seiden seems like a nice enough guy for a veteran Republican operative. Though it would be irresponsible not to speculate why he didn't last more than a year as Intel's lobbyist.

item.description: @onthemainline Fitting I notice this while researching a news story that features a crossing of the Federation and Agudah streams.
item.source:markdown: @onthemainline Fitting I notice this while researching a news story that features a crossing of the Federation and Agudah streams.

item.description:
@DrZackaryBerger Hmmm. MDs and NPs able to prescribe and refer to hands-on treatment when necessary. Had I won the lottery I'd send you a grant.

However, Phil Ochs z"l may have some cautionary advice as always. https://t.co/5ElK5miZ6S

@DrZackaryBerger Really, seems like the sort of service that a local non-profit with an interest in medical education and research (who calls? what treatment is provided? does free-and-easy intervention make a difference?) would hop at funding.

Love how Agudath Israel claims Rav Soloveitchik z"l as a past member of its Moetzes leadership body.

"You can check in any time you like, but you can never leave." https://t.co/Kv4Gj27qPI

Also, WTF was R' Henoch Leibowitz z"l of Chofetz Chaim never on the Moetzes? Or was he airbrushed out?
item.source:markdown:
Love how Agudath Israel claims Rav Soloveitchik z"l as a past member of its Moetzes leadership body.
"You can check in any time you like, but you can never leave." https://t.co/Kv4Gj27qPI
Also, WTF was R' Henoch Leibowitz z"l of Chofetz Chaim never on the Moetzes? Or was he airbrushed out?

item.description:
@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus Ha. I took a Renaissance and Reformation history course as a YU undergrad. Write a paper about how this issue played out in Prague circa 1500. (There was some defenestration involved.)

@DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus My paper lost points for being too focused on the underlying lomdus.
item.source:markdown:
